title: Keystone Icon Cheat Sheet
body: Does anyone have a link to a little cheat sheet that has all the new keystone images (as they appear on the loading screen) so I can tell what I'm looking at while the game is loading?

replies.body: just hover over them the instant game starts

> [{quoted}](name=YaRossy,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=8czvMt1A,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-09T02:51:03.755+0000)
>
> just hover over them the instant game starts

I'd really like to be able to do that on the loading screen. Would be nice if rito added that as a feature.
